title: Crest
description: Meredith thought she was safe. She thought the people she loved would always be there. She was wrong.Just as Meredith begins to embrace her new world, her life is again turned upside down. She finds herself traveling across the world to pursue the one person who has the knowledge and power to help her. As Meredith struggles with who to trust and what to do next, she is unaware that the biggest battle of her life is fast approaching.
author: Heather London
